meanings.definition: Having the strongest or most unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The garbage can was the stenchiest thing in the alley.
meanings.sent2: The skunk's spray was the stenchiest odor in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The stenchiest socks in the locker room could probably walk on their own!
meanings.sent4: The stenchiest smell from the dumpster lingered in the air like a haunting ghost.
meanings.sent5: The stenchiest aroma from the sewer grate made everyone hold their noses in disgust.

meanings.definition: The most foul or offensive odor.
meanings.sent1: The stenchiest in the room seemed to come from the old cheese.
meanings.sent2: The stenchiest filled the room, making everyone gag.
meanings.sent3: The stenchiest at the party was the result of a forgotten tuna sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The stenchiest hung in the air like a dark cloud of doom.
meanings.sent5: The stenchiest from the garbage bin made even the rats scurry away in revulsion.
